hero.tagline: My name's John, I'm a front end Developer based in San Diego, California.

about.description: With over 10 years of work experience in the marketing and advertising industry and a Bachelors of Science degree in Graphic Design. I have extensive experience in web design and development and enjoy working on detailed projects. I'm highly conceptual with a good sense for practicality. I understand the industry is always evolving so I am constantly striving to learn new skills and technoligies to create straightforward and enjoyable user experiences.
about.cta: Let's work on some projects together!

footer.description: If you'd like to get in touch, please feel free to reach out by email or fill out the form.
